item.description: Want to do None Achievement None Diary I want to go to Kubecon (2回目) Note Javaのコンテナのメモリ割り当ての考え方をまきさんに教えていただいたので記録 https://bufferings.hatenablog.com/entry/2019/11/18/000007 Helm 3.0.0 has been released! https://helm.sh/blog/helm-3-released/ Helm v3 がリリ
